sentences.en: Be aware of the departmental rota and to always be on time for duty.
sentences.cn: 了解部门的值班情况,始终准时值班.
戴夫安排了打扫卫生轮值表。

sentences.en: The tea is prepared on a rota basis by the lady members.
sentences.cn: 女性成员轮流准备茶水。

trans.tran_en: a register of names showing the order in which people take their turn to perform certain duties
